item.title: My First Post
item.description:
Welcome to My Blog!

Hi, I’m Dun Li, and this is my first blog post. In this post, I’ll talk about my research on small bodies in space, and how I’m exploring ways to analyze asteroids and comets.

Research Focus

I am currently working on modeling small bodies, such as comets and asteroids, and trying to understand their physical properties. This research is important for space exploration and for understanding how these bodies may impact Earth.
